Introduction

BIGFLO, a South Korean boy band formed by HO Company, debuted on June 23, 2014, with their mini-album *First Flow*. The original lineup featured Jungkyun, HighTop, Ron, Yuseong, and Z-UK. Over the years, the group underwent several lineup changes, including the addition of members Kichun, Euijin, Sungmin, and Lex. They actively promoted both domestically and internationally, notably debuting in Japan in April 2015 with a Japanese version of "Delilah".

In early 2019, following the expiration of contracts, several original members departed from the group. The remaining members continued activities briefly; however, the group eventually went on hiatus. Notably, in January 2024, former members Jungkyun, Ron, Z-UK, and Kichun reunited under the name WE:A, releasing teaser content for new music, indicating ongoing collaborative efforts among former members.
